quest.name: Criminal Crossings
journal:
Eshana needs you to track down fugitives from the law.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Speak with suspicious characters in the vicinity of East End.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: We have sssomething of a sssituation. The Alliance has been in contact, warning usss of a gang of cutthroat criminals that has essscaped cussstody and ssscattered across the border into the Fringes.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Our guards immediately began a sssweep of the area, but have yet to locate these fugitives. Will you lend your eyes to the hunt?

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: As for where you might look, I've jussst received reportsss of a few sussspicious characters traveling through Eassst End. It is not certain whether one or all of them are the criminals we ssseek, ssso temper your approach with caution and defend yourself if necessary.

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONA03051
dialogue.text: Eh? What? What do ye want o' me?

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONB03051
dialogue.text: ...Yes? Can you not see I'm trying to hunt?

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONC03051
dialogue.text: Was there aught I could help you with, misssir? If not, might you kindly step aside?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You've the look of a fugitive.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I'm scouting for the Resistance.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: (Say nothing).

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONA03051
dialogue.text: ...Aye, well, I'm a busy man. Why don't ye be on yer way then, eh?

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONB03051
dialogue.text: Ugh, must you loiter so!? You're scaring away the game!

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONC03051
dialogue.text: Ah. How I do adore awkward silences. You are still ruining the view, however, and I really must insist that you move along.

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONA03051
dialogue.text: Eh? A fugitive, ye say!? Cheeky bugger─be off with ye!

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONB03051
dialogue.text: I'm no criminal! And you've no evidence to accuse me of such! Leave me be!

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONC03051
dialogue.text: Me, a fugitive!? Whatever gave you that impression? I'll thank you to take your baseless accusations elsewhere!

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONA03051
dialogue.text: Is that right? I s'pose that means I'm done runnin'!

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONB03051
dialogue.text: Then I guess you weren't fooled by my disguise. Well...I can't have you blabbing now, can I?

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONC03051
dialogue.text: I thought you had the smell of authority about you. Shall we get this over with, then?

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONA03051
dialogue.text: And? What's yer bloody point?

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONA03051
dialogue.text: ...Ah, fled into the forest, did they? I've not seen any dastardly types meself, but I hope you catch 'em soon!

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONA03051
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONB03051
dialogue.text: ...I'm not sure I follow you.

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONB03051
dialogue.text: And you thought I might be one of them!? I hate to disappoint you, but I am just a simple hunter. Must be the goggles...

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONB03051
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONB03051
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONC03051
dialogue.text: What is this all about? I've merely come with an eye for the scenery...

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONC03051
dialogue.text: Villains in the forest? How terrifying! I have my spear, 'tis true, but I am far more proficient with a brush. 'Twould be best if I found a new vista to paint, it seems.

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONC03051
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONA03051
dialogue.text: Well, good for ye, lasslad. Now, how about ye try scoutin' someplace else?

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONB03051
dialogue.text: That's nice...? I'm not sure why you felt the need to tell me, but good luck with your patrol.

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSPERSONC03051
dialogue.text: A scout, you say? Jolly good. Scout away, then. Preferably somewhere far, far away. I am trying to create art here.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: How fared your hunt?

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Hah! They expected hounds on their trail and I sssent them a dragon!

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: In recent days, our neighbors' criminals have begun treating Gyr Abania as a haven─a place to essscape the fissst of jussstice.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: It falls to usss here in the Fringes to disssabuse them of that notion. Help usss keep our borders free of sssuch filth.
